summary: An ordinance relating to fire and explosion hazards and amending Sections 8.01.040, 8.01.100, 8.03.010, 8.03.020, 8.05.060, 8.05.070, 8.05.100, 8.08.060, 8.14.010, 8.14.040, 8.23.040, 8.23.070, 8.23.080, 8.23.130, 8.25.110 and 8.26.090 of the Fire Code (Ordinance 87870) and amending certain Chapter Titles therein.
